comments:
When debugging my application using Eclipse 3.2RC3, I Select a link from the console view, which should bring me to the source of the exception. Instead i get the follwing dialog:

An Exception occured while following link.

Error logged from JDT Debug UI: 
  Unable to access archive C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.jdt.source_3.1.0\src\org.junit_3.8.1\junitsrc.zip


The Eclipse log file looks like:
